text: Henri Evrot (born June 6, 1901, date of death unknown) was a French bobsledder who competed in the late 1940s. He won a bronze medal in the four-man event at the 1947 FIBT World Championships in St. Moritz. Evrot also finished 11th in the two-man event as well as 13th in the four-man event at the 1948 Winter Olympics in St. Moritz. ==References== *1948 bobsleigh two-man results *Bobsleigh four-man world championship medalists since 1930 Category:1901 births Category:Year of death missing Category:French male bobsledders Category:Olympic bobsledders of France Category:Bobsledders at the 1948 Winter Olympics
title: Henri Evrot
